short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances testing security by accessing the applicant's camera, and screen for proctoring purposes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances testing security by accessing the applicant's camera, microphone, and screen for proctoring purposes, to ensure a reliable evaluation for candidates.
